Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Steam Engine 3 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire-or Water-type move.
1 Heatproof 2 The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
18 Steelworker 3 Powers up Steel-type moves.
36 Flash Fire 3 Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
54 High-Pressured 5 The Pokémon generates a heat wave when it's hit by an attack.
72 White Smoke 5 The Pokémon's white smoke prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
90 Mega Launcher 5 Powers up aura and pulse moves.
100 Poison Heal 15 Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 01 Battle Armor 5 Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Disc 07 Illuminate 2 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
Disc 12 Sturdy 3 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
Disc 14 Flash Fire 3 Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
Disc 21 Rock Head 3 Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
Disc 22 Poison Heal 15 Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
Disc 51 Cecity -5 This Pokémon's poor eyesight makes its moves more likely to miss.
Disc 56 Rough Skin 3 This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Aftermath 2 Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
Arid Armor 2 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Arid Terrain.
Bulletproof 3 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
Calcifate 15 Normal-type moves become Rock-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Defeatist -10 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Heatproof 2 The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
High-Pressured 5 The Pokémon generates a heat wave when it's hit by an attack.
Klutz -4 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Mega Launcher 5 Powers up aura and pulse moves.
Predictable -2 This Pokémon's predictable maneuvers make moves hit against it without fail.
Pressure 5 By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
Purifying Salt 10 The Pokémon's salt protects it from statuses and halves damage from Ghost-type moves.
Rocky Payload 3 Boosts the power of Rock-type moves.
Sand Force 5 Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
Slow Start -3 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -3 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Steam Engine 3 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire-or Water-type move.
Steelworker 3 Powers up Steel-type moves.
Stench 2 By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
Toxic Boost 15 Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon is poisoned.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
White Smoke 5 The Pokémon's white smoke prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
